name: Avalanche, Seismic Shockwave
effect: Whenever Avalanche stuns a defender, exhaust target character an opponent controls.
His tremors cause devastation across the entire battlefield.

name: Beast, Quick Thinker
effect: While attacking, Beast gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF.
Beast's mind is as agile as his body.

name: Brotherhood Hideout
effect: Activate (Exhaust this location) >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Brotherhood character card with a cost of 4 or less, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
Because of Magneto's violent stand against humanity, his Brotherhood must remain in hiding . . . for now.

name: Cerebra
effect: Activate (Exhaust this location) >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an X-Men character card with a cost of 4 or greater, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
Beast designed the Cerebra system to be a more advanced Cerebro.

name: Close the Gap
effect: Target character you control has range this turn. While attacking this turn, that character gets +2 ATK. (Characters with range can attack from the support row.)
From 0 to 320 MPH in the blink of an eye.

name: Colossus, Steadfast Protector
effect: While you have 25 or less endurance Colossus has reinforcement.
With a single thought, Colossus can turn his whole body to steel, making him nearly invincible.

name: Cyclops, Optic Blast
effect: Whenever Cyclops attacks, each opponent loses 2 endurance.
Without his visor, Cyclops cannot control his lethal eye-beams.

name: Destiny, Future Sight
effect: Whenever Destiny stuns a defender, draw a card.
Her powers give her glimpses of the future, whether she wants them or not.

name: Duck and Cover
effect: Target X-Men defender you control gets +2 DEF this attack.
"Now you see me, now you don't!"

name: Eye of the Storm
effect:
Play Eye of the Storm only if you control an X-Men character.

If you control no stunned characters, gain 4 endurance.
A moment's rest is sometimes all it takes to turn the tide of battle.

name: Flattened!
effect: Target Brotherhood attacker you control gets +3 ATK this attack.
"Heh, guess I got the drop on you!"

name: Hammer Bay
effect: Brotherhood characters you control get +1 ATK.
From Hammer Bay, Magneto ruled the island nation of Genosha.

name: Iceman, Ice Armor
effect: While defending, Iceman gets -3 ATK / +3 DEF.
Iceman's freezing powers allow him to turn his body into solid ice.

name: Jean Grey, Telekinetic Fighter
effect: When Jean Grey comes into play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an X-Men character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
Born with mental powers beyond her control, Jean Grey learned to master them under the guidance of Professor X.

name: Magneto, Enemy of Man
effect: Whenever a character you control causes breakthrough, KO target stunned character an opponent controls.

name: Mastermind, Illusion Control
effect: Mastermind's mental projections convince everyone that his illusions are reality.

name: Mystique, Villainous Shapeshifter
effect: Whenever Mystique stuns an exhausted defender, KO that defender.
She can go anywhere, do anything, and be anyone.

name: Nightcrawler, Teleporting Teammate
effect: Activate (Exhaust this character) >>> Target X-Men defender you control has reinforcement this attack. (Characters attacking a character with reinforcement cannot cause breakthrough.)
Nightcrawler often uses his powers to transport the X-Men to safety.

name: Playing With Fire
effect:
As an additional cost to play Playing with Fire, exhaust a Brotherhood character you control.

Target opponent loses 4 endurance.
"When I play with fire, everybody gets burned."

name: Professor X, Friend of the Mutants
effect:
X-Men characters in your front row get +2 ATK.

X-Men characters in your support row get +2 DEF. (These powers affect Professor X.)

name: Pyro, Flame Thrower
effect: Activate (Exhaust this character) >>> Target opponent loses 4 endurance.
Pyro's costume provides the fire, and his powers do the rest.

name: Quicksilver, Magneto's Son
effect: At the start of your attack step, exhaust target support row character an opponent controls.
Quicksilver serves Magneto, but he's devoted to his sister.

name: Rogue, Energy Drain
effect: Whenever Rogue stuns a character, gain 2 endurance.
When Rogue touches others, she takes their strength, abilities, and even memories.

name: Sabretooth, Killer Instinct
effect: Sabretooth gets +2 ATK for each stunned character your opponents control.
His enhanced senses, accelerated healing, and deadly claws make him a peerless hunter.

name: Scarlet Witch, Magneto's Daughter
effect: When Scarlet Witch comes into play, target opponent loses 3 endurance.
Scarlet Witch uses her Hex Bolts to serve her father, but her true loyalty lies with her brother.

name: Storm, Wind Control
effect: Characters you control have flight. (Characters with flight can attack protected characters.)
From a gentle breeze to a raging hurricane, Storm has complete command of the weather.

name: Toad, Leaping Lackey
effect: Pay 2 endurance >>> Toad has flight this turn. While attacking this turn, Toad gets +2 ATK. Use this power only once per turn. (Characters with flight can attack protected characters.)
Toad's agility makes him an annoying--and dangerous--enemy.

name: Tooth and Claw
effect: Target attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK / -2 DEF this attack.
Locked in combat, Wolverine and Sabretooth have lost sight of the reasons behind the struggle.

name: Trickshot
effect: Target X-Men attacker or defender you control gets +2 ATK this attack if it is in your front row or +3 ATK this attack if it is in your support row.
Moves like this are perfected by hours spent in the Danger Room.

name: Unexpected Assault
effect: Target character you control has flight this turn. While attacking this turn, that character gets +2 ATK. (Characters with flight can attack protected characters.)
If only everything this dangerous were so much fun.

name: Wolverine, Adamantium Claws
effect: Pay 2 endurance >>> Wolverine gets +3 ATK / -3 DEF this attack. Use this power only once per turn.
Wolverine's razor-sharp claws are made of one of the hardest substances known to man.

name: Xavier Institute For Higher Learning
effect: Activate (Exhaust this location) >>> Target X-Men attacker or defender you control gets +1 ATK / +1 DEF this attack.
Professor Charles Xavier established his school as a haven for young mutants.
